Name: Imposing a mandatory fine of no less than $5,000 dollars for operation of an illegal commuter van.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to imposing a mandatory fine of no less than $5,000 dollars for operation of an illegal commuter van.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1. Subdivision b of section 19-528 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended to add a new paragraph 4 to read as follows:
	4. to impose a mandatory fine of no less than $5,000 upon any person operating a commuter van in violation of subdivision a of this section. 
	Â§2. This local law shall take effect immediately.
